channel.title: SurveyMonkey on Outstanding Instructions by Nick Lieurance
channel.description: Recent content in SurveyMonkey on Outstanding Instructions by Nick Lieurance

item.title: How I helped SurveyMonkey use AI to make it easy for anybody to create a survey
item.description:
Overview

Build with AI is a new way to create surveys, and it’s powered by OpenAI. The user types short instructions. Then AI generates a survey accordingly. It’s fast, accurate, and results in high-quality surveys.

My role

I wrote all the user interface copy, led feature naming efforts, and tested the content for usability. Keep reading to find out how I wrote outstanding instructions and other content that made this feature the #1 way new users create surveys.
